title: Sidewall, 1835–50
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical rectangle. In center, neo-baroque frame printed in green and violet, over-stamped in gold; repeating on field, scattered floral ornaments in green and gold, suggestive of Persian vase with flowers. Frame enclosed applied oval medallion with lithographed representation, in colors, of an interior with family gathering of men, women and children, in the costume of about 1770. Printed on blue moire ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1835–50.
1835–50. Block-printed, stamped, chromolithograph. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-45-73.
